metadata.description: “THE BEST DEFENSE” PART FOUR!  Shall not the Judge of All the Earths do right?  Norrin Radd is not so certain. But it falls to him who is the Silver Surfer to decide which planets will live…and which will feed the unending hunger of the world-devouring Galactus!  A single honest person can tip the balance…if only the Surfer can find one in time!  And the Train rolls on…
metadata.name: Silver Surfer: The Best Defense
